headline.main: 7 MORE SHIPS LISTED AS RAIDERS' VICTIMS; Indian Ocean Sinkings Laid to Group Led by the Scheer

lead_paragraph: Seven ships, six British and one Yugaslav, most of them carrying food to England, have been destroyed recently by Axis raiders operating in the Indian Ocean, marine circles here disclosed yesterday, according to The Associated Press.
abstract: N Y C marine circles rept Axis raiders in Indian Ocean sunk 6 Brit, 1 Yugoslav, ss

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
